alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 12:56AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Nye County through 145 AM PDT... At 1251 AM PDT, satellite and lightning data was indicating strong thunderstorms developing over the same areas for the past hour. These storms are producing moderate to heavy rain at times which could lead to some ponding of waters and muddy roads as well as some strong gusty winds in spots. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Satellite indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blue Eagle Ranch, Duckwater, Currant, Little Fish Lake Valley, Saulsbury Summit, Table Mountain, Troy Peak, Warm Springs and Lunar Crater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
